name: BURNBOT, INC
sampleDescriptions: General awareness around wildfire mitigation, hazardous fuels reduction and forest resilinece.
Work specifically on wildfire mitigation, hazardous fuels reduction and forest resilience work
Lobbying activities are around wildfire mitigation, hazardous fuels reduction, and forest resilience as well as the reauthorization of the surface highway transportation bill.
